title: Connection Error
body:
I'm pretty new to League and to forums in general, so not sure if this is the best place to post this.

I recently moved house and called the internet company; it will take them 3 weeks to connect the network to the new place.
Basically, I haven't had decent internet for a while. I have been playing League via portable hotspot from my phone - not the best situation, but when you need to play league, you need to play league. The other day however, the game wont log in. I type my password in, then it says "Logging in" for about a minute, before coming up with "Connection Error". I have restarted the client, hotspot and even reinstalled the game, but to no avail. Yet, when I went to someone elses house, it worked fine. 

TL;DR - game will not advance past log in screen when playing on hotspot.

Help is greatly appreciated as it sucks not being able to play, especially as it's Ocean Week...

replies.body:
Hi there, I use a phone's hotspot as my permanent internet source, yet I don't lag in game or have connection issues.

Have you tried moving your phone to an area where it gets better reception?

Yup, didnt work. My dad bought a fancy phone - Sony Acro S ($900+), yet within months we realised how terrible it is. For all I know, it could just be the phone...Very frustrating, I don't think I got my three points towards ocean week and got my name on the {{champion:111}} statue :'(

Does your phone lag when you try to access the internet directly from it? What ISP are you with?

Also I couldn't get the three points either due to other technical issues. {{item:3070}}
